name: Lang, Appellant, et al. v. Hanlon et al.

parties: Lang, Appellant, et al. v. Hanlon et al.

opinions.text:
Opinión by
Mr. Justice Maxey,
This is an appeal of Elizabeth Lang from the judgment of the court below entering judgment n. o. v. in favor of the defendant, M. A. Hanlon. The judgment is affirmed for the reasons set forth in the opinion filed to No. 182, March Term, 1931.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Maxey,

casebody.head_matter:
Lang, Appellant, et al. v. Hanlon et al.
(No. 8,
March T., 1931.)
November 23, 1931:
